page.title: 01BURNHAM MARKET
page.content: Burnham Market is situated two miles from the North Norfolk coast, 20 miles from King's Lynn and 40 miles from Norwich. The area covered by this survey forms the southern part of the village and is primarily agricultural, though there is a large amount of council housing in the north eastern corner of the survey block. Most of the village services (shops, school, churches) are in the survey block to the north, the doctors' surgery and village hall being the principal exceptions. The surrounding farmland is mostly Grade 3 agricultural land and varies in height from 25 to 212 feet above sea level. Our village is a thriving service centre and is popular with holiday- makers: there is a caravan site and many of the cottages are holiday homes.
